programme.desc: Tá Sailí agus Nic ag iarraidh gluaiseachtaí nua a dhéanamh. (Sally and Nick are having fun trying out different moves.)

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Caithfidh Pinocchio agus Sionnán liathróid a fháil ar ais. (Pinocchio and Sionnán have to retrieve a ball from an ogre's house.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Tá Tadhg in ísle brí agus déanann a chairde a ndícheall spion maith a chur air. (Jack is in low spirits. The gang do their best to raise his spirits again.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Féachann Zak agus Jason an Cárta Morvox Órga a bhuachan le cat Bhean Uí Dhonnacha. (Zak & Jason try to win the coveted Golden Morvox card.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Breithlá Zak atá ann agus tagann sé ar a bhronntanas óna thuismitheoirí sula dtugann siad dó é. (As it's Zak's birthday, he finds the present his parents have bought him.)

programme.title: Lí Ban
programme.desc: Tugann Lí Ban cuairt ar an bhfathach Bron, tá cumha ar Bron i ndiaidh a dheirféar Branwen. (Lí Ban goes to visit the giant Bron. He is missing his sister Branwen.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Éiríonn comharsa béal dorais an-chrosta le Joey agus le Yassine. (Joey and Yassine set out to help Joey's neighbour Billy relax.)

programme.title: Miraculous
programme.desc: Caithfidh Bóín Dé aghaidh a thabhairt ar chéile comhraic atá chomh cumhachtach léi féin. (Ladybug will have to confront an opponent who has the same powers as she does.)

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom
programme.desc: Éiríonn Gretchen mór le taibhse ach is cosúil go bhfuil an taibhse craiceáilte ina diaidh. (Gretchen befriends a ghost called Preston, but he gets a crush on her.)

programme.title: Go Tóin Poill
programme.desc: Tá doras curtha ag ceann de na héisc ar a theach atá an-teicniúil. (A fish secures his house with a door that is too high-tech.)

programme.title: Timpeall na Tíre
programme.desc: Achoimre ar chuid de mhórscéalta na seachtaine mar a craoladh ar Nuacht TG4. (Some of the stories from this week's regional news as seen on Nuacht TG4.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Fiosróidh Jessica cás inar leictreamharaíodh bean sa bhfolcadán. (Jessica must investigate a case in which a woman was electrocuted to death in her bathtub.)

programme.title: The Irish RM
programme.desc: Éiríonn rudaí teasaí nuair a fhaigheann Flurry agus Sally teileagram ó Mrs. Knox. (Trouble threatens when Flurry and Sally receive a telegram from Mrs. Knox.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Tá mac Dorothy le pósadh, ach tá imní ar mháithreacha na lánúine. (Dorothy's son is getting married, and the mothers of the bride and groom are concerned.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: GAA Beo
programme.desc: Craoladh beo ar Chluiche Ceannais Shraith Peile Allianz Roinn 2. Á chur i láthair ag Micheál Ó Domhnaill. (Live coverage of the Allianz Football League Division 2 Final.)

programme.title: GAA Beo
programme.desc: Craoladh beo ar Chluiche Ceannais Shraith Peile Allianz Roinn 1. Á chur i láthair ag Micheál Ó Domhnaill. (Live coverage of the Allianz Football League Division 1 Final.)

programme.title: Máthair
programme.desc: Scéal Alice McElwee, máthair Thomas McElwee a bhásaigh ar stailc ocrais in 1981. (The story of Alice McElwee whose son Thomas McElwee, who died on Hunger Strike in 1981.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: An Gobán Saor
programme.desc: Sraith ina ndéantar ceiliúradh ar an ngreann i saol na hÉireann. (Irishmen of a certain vintage and from all walks of life tell their favourite funny stories.)

programme.title: Ollchlár Ros na Rún
programme.desc: Tugann Penny le fios ar a bpodchraoladh go bhfuil sí ag súil le páiste. (Penny announces on the podcast that she is pregnant.)

programme.title: Réalta agus Gaolta
programme.desc: Táthar sa tóir ar an teaghlach is cumasaí in Éirinn agus beidh an babhta ceannais againn anocht! (The search for Ireland's most talented family continues and tonight's the final!)

programme.title: Slí na mBeaglaoich
programme.desc: Téann Breanndán & Cormac ar thuras ó Ghaeltacht Mhúscraí go Baile an Dá Chab ina veain champála. (Breanndán & Cormac travel from the Múscraí to Ballydehob in their camper.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Is i dteach tábhairne Sean Óg's i dTrá Lí i gCiarraí a rinneadh taifeadadh ar an gclár seo. (This episode comes to you from Sean Óg's in Tralee Co. Kerry.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Misneach
programme.desc: Tugtar léargas ar chúrsaí éagsúlachta agus cuimsithe i spórt sa gclár faisnéise seo. (This documentary looks at the reality of diversity and inclusion in sport.)

programme.title: Ceol ón Chlann
programme.desc: Is i mBaile Átha Cliath atá Muintir Uí Ghlacáin ag cur fúthu ach tá ceangal láidir acu le Tír Chonaill. (The Glackins were born in Dublin with strong links to Co. Donegal.)

programme.title: Glórtha ón Imeall
programme.desc: Súil siar ar na hagallaimh, taibhléirithe agus gearrscannáin ón tsraith Imeall. (A look back at interviews, performances and short film pieces from the series Imeall.)
